name: Infiniti Home Care, INC Dba Continental Home Care

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Infiniti Home Care, INC Dba Continental Home Care is a Home Health provider based in Forest Hills, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $59.4M in Medicaid payments across 347K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $59.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
